content:
Tuparetama
Tuparetama is a city  in the state of Pernambuco, Brazil. The population in 2009, according with IBGE was 8.678 inhabitants and the total area is 185.54 km².

Economy
The main economic activities in Tuparetama are based in commerce and agribusiness, especially creation of sheep, cattle, pigss, goats, chickens;  and plantations of beans and corn.
